segue_the_chain: New Order ask, ‘how does it feel?’… so does…

segue_dave.line: New Order have made House music, and one kind of House music is garage house. Let's hear a garage house track...
segue_dave.explanation: New Order have made music identifiable with the musical genre: House music, while House music is an ancestor of garage house, the musical genre to which the next track belongs
